packages.name: chaos-kraken

packages.name: chaos-monkey
packages.description: Helm chart used to deploy chaos monkey on Openshift or Kubernetes cluster.  Chaos monkey are simple litle monkey released into your K8S cluster, they could be evil or kind according to your need.  This chart is part of the startx chaos helm chart suite.
